name: Water Draw
description:
This is a simple game, but requires the brain to thinking.An amazing puzzle game.

Drag the blue water can make the yellow to green.The yellow and red water together will turn orange, and the reality of color fusion change like.

In watercolors you can connect the beautiful colors line to cross points and get three stars.

If the position no color, will use the current color to fill.

In all points,you must use color water to matching slot's color.What's color of water can you get into and how many stars you can get?congratulations.

[How To Play]
Touch and drag the water color to make the color line to fill all slot.
